tool_description: Unlock Amazon product data seamlessly with our API service! Retrieve information like titles, descriptions, images, prices, and categories using keywords or ASIN. Our interface is lightweight, secure, and reliable, with an affordable subscription fee. Explore product details effortlessly!
name: Get Amazon Product
title: Get Amazon Product

api_list.name: Search Products

required_parameters.name: locale
required_parameters.description: In the initial release of the interface, the 'locale' parameter supports only GB(amazon.co.uk).
